author: mmusich
body:
#### PR description:

The purpose of this PR is to add a tool in order to produce `SiPixelGainCalibrationForHLT` and `SiPixelGainCalibrationOffline` payloads, scaled taking into account that in the Run3 reconstruction the VCal calibration is going to be absorbed into the pixel gain payloads (see details at PR https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/29333/). 
The formulas to be applied are the following:

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5082376/88267228-d52d4880-ccd0-11ea-9b34-da85db5a3374.png)

#### PR validation:

Standalone private tests.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

This PR is not a backport, and no backport is needed.

title: add tool to scale SiPixelGainCalibration payloads by including VCal calibration
